snippet: The arsenal shows how motorcycle gang members were expecting a violent encounter when they converged at a restaurant on Sunday, the police said.
abstract: Investigators say they have recovered over 300 weapons from area around Twin Peaks restaurant in Waco, Tex, where rival biker gangs engaged in bloody battle, pointing to level of violence in incident.

byline.original: By MANNY FERNANDEZ, ALAN BLINDER and RICHARD PÉREZ-PEÑA
byline.contributor: Manny Fernandez reported from Waco, Alan Blinder from Atlanta, and Richard Pérez-Peña from New York. David Montgomery contributed reporting from Waco.

lead_paragraph: The arsenal shows how motorcycle gang members were expecting a violent encounter when they converged at a restaurant on Sunday, the police said.

headline.main: Hundreds of Weapons, ‘and Counting,’ Recovered After Waco Melee
headline.print_headline: 300 Weapons Seized After Melee in Texas
